citation: Bouchet, P. (2010). Issa Bergh, 1881. In:  MolluscaBase (2017). Accessed through:  World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id=527530 on 2017-12-11
unacceptreason: Unnecessary substitute name for Colga and junior homonym of Issa Walker, 1867; Issena is a replacement name
